headline: Is The Clorox Company (CLX) The Best Defensive Stock Amid Market Volatility?
summary: We recently published a list of 15 Best Defensive Stocks Amid Market Volatility In this article, we are going to take a look at where The Clorox Company (NYSE:CLX) stands against other best defensive stocks amid market volatility.
